notes.entropy_rank_theory: Computes two MC theory baselines: (1) i.i.d. Gaussian logits with sigma^2=q_var_per_dim*k_var_per_dim; (2) structured bilinear logits L=QK^T/sqrt(d_k) with Q,K Gaussian using observed per-dim variances. Both passed through softmax to estimate entropy/maxp/rank_eff.
notes.logit_theory: Assumes q and k are independent Gaussians; then logits are approx N(0, q_var_per_dim*k_var_per_dim).
notes.tau_theory: Assumes Q components are Gaussian with per-dim variance q_var_per_dim; then tau distribution is chi-based.
